text: Daniel Catán Porteny (3 April 1949 in Mexico City - 9 April 2011 in Austin, Texas) was a Mexican opera composer of Jewish descent.The Guardian He is best known for turning the Italian movie, Il Postino, into an opera. He was working at the University of Texas at Austin on a new opera based on the Frank Capra movie, Meet John Doe. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Website of Daniel Catán *Official Facebook Page of Daniel Catán *G.
